events.title: Roadside Poutine Stand
events.description: A red food truck waves you down with the promise of squeaky cheese curds and hot gravy.

choices.label: Splurge on a family-size box
choices.description: Spend $2 to boost everyone's morale and energy.

effects.message: The crew debates the best curds-to-gravy ratio.

choices.outcome: Bellies warm and spirits high, you roll onward with sticky fingers.

choices.label: Ask for samples only
choices.description: Nibble just enough to keep morale steady.

effects.message: A sympathetic vendor slips extra fries into the sample boat.

choices.outcome: Not quite a meal, but the salt tide keeps fatigue away for another leg.

choices.label: Wave and keep driving
choices.description: Save money for gas and repairs.

effects.message: You promise the crew a feast at the next major stop.

choices.outcome: The van smells faintly of gravy regret.

events.title: Black Ice on the Shoulder
events.description: A sudden cold snap has glazed the next stretch of road in invisible ice.

choices.label: Crawl forward at a snail's pace
choices.description: Burn extra gas but protect the van.

effects.message: Hazard lights blink as you inch past the frosted bend.

choices.outcome: Progress is slow, but the ride stays intact.

choices.label: Maintain speed and trust your reflexes

effects.message: The van fishtails before catching traction near a snowbank.

choices.outcome: You power through, but the shocks complain loudly.

choices.label: Pull over and camp until sunrise
choices.description: Spend snacks to wait it out and maybe spot aurora.

effects.message: You brew cocoa, watch the sky dance, and wait for salt trucks.

choices.outcome: The dawn thaw makes for safer progress, even if you're running lean on snacks.
